content: the easy linen stitch hat keeps you cozy on even the coldest days this bulky weight beanie is worked from the crown to the brim all in linen stitch this makes it a quick project even for beginners the pattern includes written instructions for 5 sizes from preemie to adult plus links to fully-captioned tutorial videos measurements preemie 9 5 24 cm circumference x 3 25 8 cm in height newborn 12 5 cm circumference x 5 13 cm in height baby 15 38 cm circumference x 5 5 14 cm in height child 18 45 5 cm circumference x 6 5 16 5 cm in height adult 22 5 57 cm circumference x 8 25 21 cm in height
